SummaryEnglish: Nao Kanzaki, is a college student who is known for her honesty and naivete. One day, she receives a black postcard indicating that she has been selected to participate in the "Liar Game Tournament". Along with the postcard is a box with 100 million yen. The goal of the first round of the game is to trick the other player out of their hundred million yen. At the end, the winner would get to keep the hundred million earned, and the loser owes the LGT 100 million yen, which "will be collected by any means and at all costs".

1.SummaryEnglish: Based on a manga created by Kaitani Shinobu, this movie is set where the 2nd season of the drama series left off. In the first series, a college student Nao Kanzaki is lured into a mysterious game by tricking other players to win. However Nao got tricked by her former sensei, desperate for help, she enlisted the aid of person named Shinichi Akiyama. In the second series, the duo is faced against new opponents with the help of a rival player named Fukunaga . In Liar game: Final Stage, Players are encouraged to trust each other to win the tournament. However, a mysterious player named X is secretly plotting to sabotage everyone of their chances to win the LGT.

2.TitleEnglish: LIAR GAME: Reborn Special ~ Fukunaga VS Yokoya
2.SummaryEnglish: To exact revenge, the Liar Game office is revived. The target is only one person - Shinichi Akiyama (Shota Matsuda). Because of new heroine Shinomiya (Mikako Tabe), Shinichi, who kept refusing to take part in the game, finds himself in the game. Along with Akiyama, there's 19 other players competing for the prize of 2 billion yen. Omega (Makiko Esumi), who revived the game, plays the game at the Liar Game office with Alice (Mana Ashida). Alice sets up the game, chooses the players and sets the traps.

4.SummaryEnglish: Spin-off drama “Alice in Liar Game” depicts the past history of genius girl Alice (Mana Ashida) and her relationship with Omega (Makiko Esumi) of the Liar Game organization.

5.SummaryEnglish: Spin-off drama “Alice in Liar Game” depicts the past history of genius girl Alice (Mana Ashida) and her relationship with Omega (Makiko Esumi) of the Liar Game organization.

6.SummaryEnglish: Spin-off drama “Alice in Liar Game” depicts the past history of genius girl Alice (Mana Ashida) and her relationship with Omega (Makiko Esumi) of the Liar Game organization.

7.SummaryEnglish: Spin-off drama “Alice in Liar Game” depicts the past history of genius girl Alice (Mana Ashida) and her relationship with Omega (Makiko Esumi) of the Liar Game organization.

8.SummaryEnglish: Takes place after Season 2 but before The Final Stage. Showing Nao's decision to entered Liar Game again as well as Akiyama's continuing search for the boss of Liar Game in the Garden of Eden.

1.TitleEnglish: A fierce brain battle over 100 million dollars starts
1.SummaryEnglish: A female college student challenges a mysterious game with a genius scammer. A parcel containing a bundle of 100 million yen was delivered to a female college student, Nao. Nao is a squirrel who participates in the "Liar Game" where he competes with his opponent for a lot of money. Nao, who was deceived by his opponent's former teacher, Fujisawa, for 100 million yen, asks Akiyama, a genius scammer who has just been released, for cooperation.

2.TitleEnglish: A stirring 2nd episode!! The grand struggle for an end!? Akiyama's secret plan in obtaining a turn-around victory is what!?

3.TitleEnglish: The chilling 3rd episode!! The minority voting competition for 2.2 billion (yen) starts. A new stage is set for the battle, and you survived!?

4.TitleEnglish: A stunning 4th episode!! X's true colors are revealed!! The outcome of X vs Akiyama is!? Making a comeback after turning the tables!!

5.TitleEnglish: The shocking conclusion!! Who will capture the 2.1 billion prize!? LGT's true motive is!? Onward to the next round!!

6.TitleEnglish: The terrible restructuring game of the consolation tournament begins!! In the nadir of despair, the ensnared Nao fights alone!!

7.TitleEnglish: Restructuring is inevitable under the desperate situation!! Nao falls into despair!! Will a miracle of restoration occur!? And Akiyama is!?

8.TitleEnglish: Deeply moved!! Nao gets closer to the core!! Akiyama is amazing, conclusion of the restructuring game! Onto the next stage!!

9.TitleEnglish: Earth-splitting!! Contraband game!! Appearance of a mysterious & formidable enemy Can we win!? Nao & Akiyama's new battle begins

10.TitleEnglish: Development of frenzy!! Yokoya's terrifying true colors, Akiyama cries out!! Nao weeps bitterly!! Breathless revolt surge.

11.TitleEnglish: Leronira's Final Game Saturday's Premium Special Project: 3 Hour Special

12.TitleEnglish: Leronira's Final Game Saturday's Premium Special Project: Part 2

13.TitleEnglish: Leronira's Final Game Saturday's Premium Special Project: Part 3

1.SummaryEnglish: A sequel to a drama in which a "game of deception" is played by betting a huge amount of money. Two years after finishing the third round of the Liar Game with the genius scammer Akiyama, a female college student who lived a peaceful life receives a letter of invitation for the fourth round. Nao tells her intention to decline, but she ends up participating in her secretary, Tanimura.

6.TitleEnglish: The mystery of the secret weapon
